subject: RE: [junit] Non unit tests (package tests and sample client use tests)
msgSnippet: ... http://www.jdemo.de/ I ll check it out. Thanks for the pointer.
messageBody:
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Ilja Preuss [mailto:preuss@...]
> Sent: Friday, February 27, 2004 7:10 AM
> To: junit@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: RE: [junit] Non unit tests (package tests and sample
> client use tests)
>
>
> Ray Tayek wrote:
> > I find myself
> > writing a sample usage (outside the package) - something a client
> > would do or use as an example or maybe to load test. So I made this
> > guy run the package test and then his own tests. Seems like we will
> > end up with some kind of hierarchy of tests.
>
> Sorry, can't help you with your original question.
>
> But for "sample usage code" you might want to take a look at
http://www.jdemo.de/

I'll check it out.

Thanks for the pointer.
